body: The PumpGain abilities should have some kind of modified TimingHint. Currently have a Korozda Guildmage giving an attacker +1/+1 and intimitate after blockers (Which is still handy, but never gives intimidate when useful due to Pump timing instead of Attack)
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: PumpGain timing with combat abilities
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on April 15, 2014 06:07:42_

The PumpGain abilities should have some kind of modified TimingHint. Currently have a Korozda Guildmage giving an attacker +1/+1 and intimitate after blockers (Which is still handy, but never gives intimidate when useful due to Pump timing instead of Attack)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=586_
